_comments: promo pattern: target the full set, set ALL to promo:false, pull in the indivdual promo cards and override their src/num/promo=true/includedReason/usableForDeckBuilding, then delete all cards where promo is still false

exceptions._comment: m20+ promo packs include a curated list of standard legal cards as possible promos which we'll import from mtgjson/gatherer
